experience.title: October 2022
experience.cardDetailedText:
Worked on a GCS system using a Python (Flask) backend communicating with an onboard Raspberry pi, connected using a RocketM5.
Developed a manual detection system, allowing a user to easily select a target of interest and send the calculated spatial coordinates to a flight controller.
Worked on extracting meta data from images and using a geolocation algorithm to determine ML detection locations.

experience.title: May 2024
experience.cardDetailedText: C++ Desktop application development. Focused on developing a 3D CAD tool for geotechnical engineers. Focuses on computer graphics (VTK and Qt), inter-process APIâ€™s, software testing. Held the role of srum master. Scheduling, leading and coordinating daily scrum and inter-team scrum review meetings. Scrum and Iteration planning, bug estimations. Participated in build triage. Analysis of DevOps pipeline build failures. Investigation into solutions to fix these failures / timeouts.

experience.title: July 2024
experience.cardDetailedText: Designed an ML architecture for a YOLO algorithm from scratch for the task of detection, classification, and localization of objects. Designed an algorithm to calculate precise longitude and latitude coordinates of detected targets. Led a team of engineers to develop an accurate detection and classification system using tensorflow.
